title: viN mukhattilum
sahitya:
viN mukhattilum maN mukhattilum un taNmukham kANa vA SaNmukhapriyA


anupallavi

  uNNum pOdum nAn urangum pOdumE eNNum pOdum anbu paNNum paNbinAlE


caraNam    uLLam unnaik-kUvum vaLLik-kuyilanrO Unuyirum unadu jnAna mayilanrO veLLamAga 
mana vETkai vimmudayyA aLLi aNaiya vA azhagA kuzhagA amudA murugA
